title: Annual imports of cement into Great Britain by importer 2001 to 2018
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely by manufacturers, and by others. The y axis represents Imports in thousand metric tons and the x axis represents Year.
Overall by others is gradually increasing, by manufacturers is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. by others, and lastly, 2. by manufacturers.
Throughout the period, by others generally had the highest Imports in thousand metric tons relative to others with an average of 1139.78, and it reached its maximum at 2017 with a value of 1932.0.
The botommost line, by manufacturers,  has a mean of 424.22, and peaked at 2001.
min_summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting by manufacturers, and by others. The y axis indicates the Imports in thousand metric tons and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall by others is gradually increasing, by manufacturers is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, by others mostly maintained the highest Imports in thousand metric tons when compared to others with a mean value of 1139.78, and it peaked at 2017.
by manufacturers mostly had the least Imports in thousand metric tons with a mean value of 424.22, which peaked at 2001 with a value of 1182.0.
